item.title: Apply online by 13 April for Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET 2014) for UG programs in Law, Design, Engineering, Health
item.description: The Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET) 2014 is a written exam that evaluates candidates for admission to under graduate programs in law, design, engineering, health sciences at Symbiosis International University's (SIU) institutes.

item.title: AILET 2016 Exam by National Law University, Delhi (NLU) for LL.B, LL.M & Ph.D
item.description: The National Law University, Delhi (NLU) would be conducting the All India Law Entrance Test on 1 May, 2016. Important dates related to the exam:

item.title: All India Law Admission Notices and Exam Alerts 2014
Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University's GGSIPU CET 2014 Exam Schedule
item.description: Planning on getting into Indraprastha University? Read through this article to know more on applying and registering for Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University's CET 2014.

item.title: Rajiv Gandhi School of Intellectual Property Law - IIT Kharagpur - LL.B program 2014
item.description: IIT Kharagpur's law school is inviting applications to its LL.B program for the 2014-15 academic session.

item.title: 6th All India Bar Examination (AIBE VI) 2013 on 19 January, 2014
item.description: The Bar Council of India (BCI) has release the exam notification for the sixth AIBE.

item.title: Indian Law Institute 2013 Admission Alert for 1 yr & 2 yr LL.M. and PG Diploma Courses
item.description: Indian Law Institute Invites Applications for 2013-2015

item.title: All India Bar Examination (AIBE) 2013 on 14 July, 2013
item.description: The BCI has notified that AIBE 2013 will be held on 14 July, 2013. Learn about the details here.

item.title: Faculty of Law, Delhi University's LL.B. & LL.M. Entrance Test 2013
item.description: The Faculty of Law, Delhi University will conduct the entrance exams for admission to its LL.B. and LL.M. courses 2013-14 on 9 June and 16 June, 2013.

item.title: LAWCET and PGLCET to be held by Sri Venkateswara University, Tirupati on 6 June, 2013
item.description: The LAWCET and PGLCET will held by Sri Venkateswara University, Tirupati in June. You may be eligible to take the test if you fulfill the necessary requirements.

item.title: Symbiosis Entrance Test (SET) 2013
item.description: The entrance test for undergraduate admission to Symbiosis International University will be offered on 4 May, 2013. Find out test administration details.

item.title: Admission to B.A, LL.B (Hons.), LL.M, Ph.D at National Law University (NLU) through AILET 2013
item.description: National Law University (NLU), New Delhi is conducting the All India Law Entrance Test (AILET 2013) on 28 April 2013 for admission to its B.A, LL.B (Hons.), LL.M and Ph.D Programmes for the academic year 2013-14
